title: Dell security advisory (AV25-172)
description: Between March 24 and 30, 2025, Dell published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following products:
products: Dell Enterprise SONiC Distribution   versions prior to 4.4.2
Dell ObjectScale   versions prior to ObjectScale 4.0
Dell Storage Monitoring and Reporting   versions prior to 5.0.2.2
Dell Storage Monitoring and Reporting   versions prior to 5.0.2.2
Dell Storage Resource Manager   versions prior to 5.0.2.2
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
